nodes.diffHunk: @@ -57,4 +64,21 @@ public RelativePathsCleanup(BibDatabaseContext databaseContext, FilePreferences return Collections.emptyList(); } + /** + * Checks, if the given file path is a well-formed web url + * + * @param filePath file path to check + * @return true, if the given file path is a web url, false otherwise + */ + private static boolean isWebUrl(String filePath)

nodes.bodyText: Concerning isOnlineLink(): I would recommend removing "toCheck.contains("www.")", because a path to a local file might contain this pattern coincidentally. What do you say?
